title: Object Relational Mapping
content: Objectâ€“relational mapping is a programming technique for converting data between type systems using object-oriented programming languages.

title: MVC
content: The Model-View-Controller (MVC) is an architectural pattern that separates an application into three main logical components: the model, the view, and the controller.

title: Sequelize
content: Sequelize is an easy-to-use and promise-based Node.js ORM tool for Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB, SQLite, DB2, Microsoft SQL Server, and Snowflake.
